metadata.title: CVE-2024-46722 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: fix mc_data out-of-bounds read warningClear warning that read mc_data[i-1] may out-of-bounds.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
